name: SpaceLoop (HungryCatGames)
description:
Developed in a weekend for the Ludum Date 47 game jam challenge. 

You're stuck in a sphere, spinning in a loop. Fire away at the bricks and see if you can destroy them all.  Might seem easy at first, but it quickly gets harder. 

Best played in full screen mode. Simple mouse control. (move, left click to shoot)
